def load_structure_report(path: str):

# backend/scripts/structure_fix_applier.py

import os
import json
import shutil
from pathlib import Path
from datetime import datetime

REPORT_PATH = "./memory/reports/structure_report.json"
BACKUP_ROOT = "./memory/structure_fixes_backup"

def load_structure_report(path: str):
    if not os.path.exists(path):
        raise FileNotFoundError(f"âŒ ë¦¬í¬íŠ¸ íŒŒì¼ ì—†ìŒ: {path}")
    with open(path, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:

def backup_path_for(file_path: str) -> str:

    rel_path = Path(file_path).relative_to("/home/duksan/ë°”íƒ•í™”ë©´/gumgang_0_5")
    return os.path.join(BACKUP_ROOT, timestamp, str(rel_path))

def move_to_backup(file_path: str):
    dest = backup_path_for(file_path)
    os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(dest), exist_ok=True)
    shutil.move(file_path, dest)

def apply_duplicate_file_fixes(duplicates: list, dry_run: bool):
    print("\nğŸ“ ì¤‘ë³µ íŒŒì¼ ì •ë¦¬ ì‹œì‘...")
    for file_entry in duplicates:

            keep = paths[0]  # ê¸°ë³¸ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì²« ê²½ë¡œë§Œ ìœ ì§€
            print(f"  â³ ìœ ì§€í•  ê²½ë¡œ: {keep}")
            for dup in paths[1:]:
                if not os.path.exists(dup):
                    print(f"  âš ï¸ ê²½ë¡œ ì—†ìŒ (ìŠ¤í‚µ): {dup}")
                    continue
                if dry_run:

                else:
                    backup = move_to_backup(dup)
                    print(f"  âœ… ì´ë™ ì™„ë£Œ â†’ {backup}")

def apply_unlinked_file_fixes(unlinked: list, dry_run: bool):
    print("\nğŸ“ ì—°ê²°ë˜ì§€ ì•Šì€ íŒŒì¼ ì •ë¦¬ ì‹œì‘...")
    for file_entry in unlinked:
        for filename, paths in file_entry.items():

                    print(f"  âš ï¸ ê²½ë¡œ ì—†ìŒ (ìŠ¤í‚µ): {path}")
                    continue

                else:
                    os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(dest), exist_ok=True)
                    shutil.move(path, dest)
                    print(f"  âœ… ì´ë™ ì™„ë£Œ: {path} â†’ {dest}")

def warn_only_backend_frontend_mismatch(warnings: list):
    print("\nâš ï¸ ë°±ì—”ë“œ-í”„ë¡ íŠ¸ ë¯¸ì—°ê²° í•­ëª©:")

def main():

if __name__ == "__main__":

async def harvest(request: Request):
